alert.note: Alert for Sandusky; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 10:08AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Seneca and Sandusky Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1008 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fostoria, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Bellevue, Clyde, Gibsonburg, Green Springs, Ballville, Bettsville, Risingsun, Republic, Lindsey, Helena, Burgoon, Flat Rock, Bascom, Kansas, Stony Prairie, Whites Landing and Vickery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northwestern Ohio.
